TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ShapeNodes implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 所有的集合对象中指定的任意多边形。

span.span: A collection of all the objects in the specified freeform.

span.para: 每个ShapeNode对象代表任意多边形中的线段或任意多边形曲线段的控点之间的节点。您可以创建任意多边形手动或使用和方法。
使用方法可创建一个新的节点，并将其添加到ShapeNodes集合。
使用节点()，其中是节点索引号，可返回单个ShapeNode对象。
Each ShapeNode object represents either a node between segments in a freeform or a control point for a curved segment of a freeform. You can create a freeform manually or by using the and methods.
Use the property to return the ShapeNodes collection.
Use the method to create a new node and add it to the ShapeNodes collection.
Use Nodes(), where is the node index number, to return a single ShapeNode object.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

span.span: The type of line that connects the inserted node to the neighboring nodes.

param.name: EditingType
param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 插入的顶点的编辑属性。

span.span: The editing property of the inserted node.

param.name: X1

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 如果新线段是msoEditingAuto时，此参数指定的水平距离，以磅为单位，从左上角的新线段端点的文档。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingAuto, this argument specifies the horizontal distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the end point of the new segment.

param.span: 如果的新节点是msoEditingCorner时，此参数指定的水平距离，以磅为单位，从左上角的新段的第一个控制点的文档。

span.span: If the of the new node is msoEditingCorner, this argument specifies the horizontal distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the first control point for the new segment.

param.name: Y1

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 如果新线段是msoEditingAuto时，此参数指定的垂直距离，以磅为单位，从左上角的新线段端点的文档。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingAuto, this argument specifies the vertical distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the end point of the new segment.

param.span: 如果的新节点是msoEditingCorner时，此参数指定的垂直距离，以磅为单位，从左上角的新段的第一个控制点的文档。

span.span: If the of the new node is msoEditingCorner, this argument specifies the vertical distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the first control point for the new segment.

param.name: X2
param.span: 可选单个。

span.span: Optional Single.

param.span: 如果新线段是msoEditingCorner时，此参数指定的水平距离，以磅为单位，从左上角的新段的第二个控制点的文档。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingCorner, this argument specifies the horizontal distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the second control point for the new segment.

param.span: 如果的新线段是msoEditingAuto，不指定此参数的值。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingAuto, don't specify a value for this argument.

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingCorner, this argument specifies the vertical distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the second control point for the new segment.

param.span: 如果的新线段是msoEditingAuto，不指定此参数的值。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingCorner, this argument specifies the horizontal distance, measured in points, from the upper-left corner of the document to the end point of the new segment.

param.span: 如果的新线段是msoEditingAuto，不指定此参数的值。

span.span: If the of the new segment is msoEditingAuto, don't specify a value for this argument.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetEditingType (int Index, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEditingType EditingType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetEditingType([in]int32 Index, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEditingType EditingType) runtime managed
Public Sub SetEditingType (Index As Integer, EditingType As MsoEditingType)
public: void SetEditingType(int Index, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoEditingType EditingType);

param.name: Index

span.span: Required Integer.

param.span: 要设置其编辑类型的节点。

span.span: The node whose editing type is to be set.

param.name: EditingType
param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 顶点的编辑属性。

span.span: The editing property of the vertex.

summary.span: 设置指定节点的编辑类型。

span.span: Sets the editing type of the specified node.

span.para: 如果节点是曲线段的控制点，则此方法将设置与之相邻的连接两个段节点的编辑类型。请注意，具体取决于的编辑类型，此方法可能会影响相邻节点的位置。

If the node is a control point for a curved segment, this method sets the editing type of the node adjacent to it that joins two segments. Note that depending on the editing type, this method may affect the position of adjacent nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPosition (int Index, float X1, float Y1);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPosition([in]int32 Index, [in]float32 X1, [in]float32 Y1) runtime managed
Public Sub SetPosition (Index As Integer, X1 As Single, Y1 As Single)
public: void SetPosition(int Index, float X1, float Y1);

param.name: Index

span.span: Required Integer.

param.span: 要设置其位置的节点。

span.span: The node whose position is to be set.

param.name: X1

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 新节点相对于文档左上角的位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position (in points) of the new node relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

param.name: Y1

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 新节点相对于文档左上角的位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position (in points) of the new node relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
Sets the location of the specified node.

span.para: 请注意，具体取决于节点的编辑类型，此方法可能会影响相邻节点的位置。
Note that depending on the editing type of the node, this method may affect the position of adjacent nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSegmentType (int Index, Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoSegmentType SegmentType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetSegmentType([in]int32 Index, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoSegmentType SegmentType) runtime managed
Public Sub SetSegmentType (Index As Integer, SegmentType As MsoSegmentType)
public: void SetSegmentType(int Index, Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoSegmentType SegmentType);

param.name: Index

span.span: Required Integer.

param.span: 要设置其段类型的节点。

span.span: The node whose segment type is to be set.

param.name: SegmentType
param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 指明线段是直线还是曲线。

span.span: Specifies if the segment is straight or curved.

summary.span: 设置紧跟指定节点后面的段的段类型。

span.span: Sets the segment type of the segment that follows the specified node.

span.para: 如果节点是曲线段的控制点，则此方法设置该曲线的线段类型。注意，这可能影响通过插入或删除相邻节点的节点的总数。
If the node is a control point for a curved segment, this method sets the segment type for that curve. Note that this may affect the total number of nodes by inserting or deleting adjacent nodes.
